paper.title: On the Bayesian interpretation of Black-Litterman
paper.abstract: We present the most general model of the type considered by Black and Litterman (1991) after fully clarifying the duality between Black Litterman optimization and Bayesian regression. Our generalization is itself a special case of a Bayesian network or graphical model. As an example, we work out in full detail the treatment of views on factor risk premia in the context of APT. We also consider a more speculative example in which the portfolio manager specifies a view on realized volatility by trading a variance swap. (C) 2016 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论了Black-Litterman优化模型及其与贝叶斯回归的对偶关系，并详细阐述了在APT背景下对因子风险溢价的处理。这些内容直接关联到投资组合的构建和优化，属于投资组合管理领域。虽然论文提到了方差互换交易，但这只是作为示例，并非主要研究方向。
